title: 'Good so far'
body: 'Its very soft. Heavy. Thick. Will update after using for the while winter'

title: 'Very good'
body: It's a very heavy fleece blanket in my opinion. Size is very big too despite ordering single sized. Air cnt pass throught it so it will keep warm in winter months and one can even double it for a single person. Value for money

title: 'Go for it in Winter'
body: I read some negative reviews about this product but still went ahead and purchased & I am happy that I did. It's soft, it's big enough & it's warm for the current winter season. I see that price has increased by ~25% in just 3 days after I purchased it. It did not smell bad. Although additional packaging could have been better instead of a plastic roll. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.  I must admit that at same price, you can get even better blanket in offline shop but you need time to do that. So go for it if you are looking for something online

title: 'Perfect'
body: 'This blanket works really well. I have used it during the harsh winters and it was really comfortable. Worth the money.'

title: 'It is not suitable for even mild winter. Fleece Yarn keeps on coming..'
'Bought two of these!'
body: 'This blanket is a boon during winters
column5: but still breathable. So if you are looking for extreme heat retention or live in a very cold place maybe checkout some thicker options. But this works well in mild-medium winter conditions. Purchased these in 2 colours

title: 'Love it
column5: 'softer feel compared to d usual fleece blankets slightly bulkier dan d usual fleece blankets but not so much dat its an inconvenience. it is very convenienr to wash in a 6 kg washing machine good purchase.love it nd d choice of color other dan d browns n blacks n greys available.'

title: 'Best purchase'

title: It's soft and cozy
body: Loved the color and it's so soft and feels warm .

title: 'Warm and comfortable'
body: I was sceptical about buying a synthetic blanket because I was afraid of static and the quickly-too-warm feeling, if you know what I mean... but didn't want a cotton Razai because it's cold to the touch initially and only gradually warms up with one's body temperature.  I'm satisfied with this blanket. It's comfortable against the skin and doesn't get uncomfortable warm but is warm enough to improve sleep (Bangalore monsoon cold). Not too heavy, not too light, just right.  Only, the blanket was sent in a huge box in which the blanket was basically rolling around--approx a 3'x2'x2.5' box! It could have been sent in quarter that size.

title: 'Color is too dull..'

title: 'A good product.'

title: 'Soft. Warmth. No air inside.'
body: 'This is good for place with extreme temperature. I live in chennai with moderate cold. I feel like there is zero air circulation inside
column5: kind of suffocating. It protects against any freezing temperature i think. It is soft and i got big size so head n leg both covers without pulling either side. But if you want atleast little air inside like me
column6: then go for some other blanket.'
